pr_title: Include 3rd party licenses and source in container images

timeline.message:
Include 3rd party licenses and source in container images

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText: I"m presuming none of the README.md docs need to be updated noting this?
timeline.author: Nana-EC
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -101,6 +102,25 @@
     <build>
         <pluginManagement>
             <plugins>
+                <!-- Download library source jars and package in container image for GCP Marketplace compliance -->

replies.bodyText: No, it's completely automated. No one needs to be aware of this content except GCP Marketplace, which filling out the worksheet will do.
replies.author: steven-sheehy
